body_content.explanation: a person who spells words in the way that is described:
examples: With these games we hope to make it cool to be a good speller.
In school I was always a bad speller.
Hemingway, Keats, Virginia Woolf, and Yeats were all said to be appalling spellers.
She said that frequent texters tend to be better spellers, because they're much more used to writing.

body_content.explanation: a person who takes part in a spelling competition:
examples: She was one of only 12 spellers who made it to the finals broadcast live on ABC.
They publish grammars, usage guides, pronunciation guides, spellers, etc.
